text:
*CMS Default System Templates*

Hi team,

I am here to get help in the following scenario. I want to customize the membership access denied template in HubSpot.

Please consider the attached screenshot and suggest the best possible solution:

* Why am I not able to clone the cmsdefaultsystempages theme?
* Could you tell me how to customize the system page templates?
* How I can change the value of template_translations variables used in templates (e.g. template_translations.member_access_denied_heading.message)

Please suggest to me the best possible solution to correct my understanding.

Thanks in advance.
